title: Birthday ki toh party honi cha
shayari: Birthday ki toh party honi chahiye,wish to morning ki bhi hoti hai.

title: Tohfa-e-dil de doon ya de doon
shayari: Tohfa-e-dil de doon ya de doon chand taare,Janam din pe tuje kya du ye puche mujhse saareZindagi tere naam kar doon toh bhi kam hain,Daman me bhar du har pal khushiya me tumhare.

title: Main likh du tumhari umar chan
shayari: Main likh du tumhari umar chand sitaaro se,Janamdin manau main phoolo se baharo seHar ek khoobsurti duniya se main lekar aau,Mehfil ye sajaau main har haseen najaro se

title: Zaroor tumko kisine dil se puk
shayari: Zaroor tumko kisine dil se pukara hoga,Ek baar to chand ne bhi tumko nihara hoga,Mayus hue honge sitare bhi us din,Khuda ne jab Zamin par tumko utara hoga.Janmadin Mubarak!

title: Har lamha apke hothon pe muska
shayari: Har lamha apke hothon pe muskan rahe,Har ghum se aap anjaan rahen,Jiske sath mehak uthe aapki zindgi,Hamsha aapke pass woh insan rahe.Happy Birthday

title: Har raah aasan ho,Har raah pe
shayari: Har raah aasan ho,Har raah pe khushiya ho,Har din khubsoorat ho,Aisa hi poora jivan ho,Yahi har din meri dua ho,Aisa hi tumhara har janamdin ho.

title: Ae Khuda Mere Yaar Ka Daman Kh
shayari: Ae Khuda Mere Yaar Ka Daman Khusiyon Se Saza De,Uske Janamdin Par Usi Ki Koi Raza De,Dar Par Tere Aunga Har Saal,Ki Usko Gile Ki Na Koi Wajah De.

title: Tamnnaon se bhari ho jindgi,Kw
shayari: Tamnnaon se bhari ho jindgi,Kwahisho se bhara ho har pal,Daaman bhi chhota lagne lage,Itani khushiya de aapko aane wala kal!!Happy Birth Day

title: Dua hai Ki Kamyabi ke har sikh
shayari: Dua hai Ki Kamyabi ke har sikhar per aap ka naam hoga,Aapke har kadam per duniya ka salaam hoga,Himmat se mushkilon ka saamna karna,Hamari dua hai ki waqt bhi ek din aapka gulam hoga.

title: Dur hai to kya hoa aaj ka din
shayari: Dur hai to kya hoa aaj ka din to hame yaad hai,Tum na sahi par tumhara saya to hamare sath hai,Tumhe lagta hai hum sab bhul jate haiPar dekhlo tumhara janamdin to hame yaad hai.

title: Ek dua hai koi gila nhi ho,Ais
shayari: Ek dua hai koi gila nhi ho,Aisa pyar ka phool jo aaj tak khila na ho,Aaj mile wo sab apkoJo kabhi kisi ko mila na ho.

title: Hamare liye khaas hai aaj ka d
shayari: Hamare liye khaas hai aaj ka din,Jo nhi beetana chahate apke bin,Wese to har dua aapke liye mangte haiFir bhi khete hai khub sari khushiyan mile apko is janamdin.

title: Ye dua hai aapke janamdin pe h
shayari: Ye dua hai aapke janamdin pe hamari,Na tute kabhi dosti hamari,Sari jindgi denge khushiyan aapkoOr wo khushiyan hogi pyari pyari.

title: Khuda ek manat hai hamari,Meri
shayari: Khuda ek manat hai hamari,Meri jaan janat hai hamari,Chahe ham ho na ho sath unkePar khusiyan mile unko sari pyari.

shayari: Pyar se bhari jindgi mile aapko,Khusiyon se bhare pal mile aapko,Kabhi kisi gham ka saamna na karna padeAisa aane wala kal mile aapko.

shayari: Hamari ek pyari si dua hai,Aapki har dua puri ho,Jo pyari chahate hoti hai sapno meinWo sari chahate aapki puri ho.

title: Aapko yad rahe ya na rahe,Hamk
shayari: Aapko yad rahe ya na rahe,Hamko rahta hai yad ye din har din,Hamare liye to bahut khaas haiKyoki yhi to hai hamari jaan ka janamdin.

title: Gulab ki tarah khushiyan khile
shayari: Gulab ki tarah khushiyan khile jivan mein apke,Khusboo ki tarha hasi bani rahe hothon pe apke,Muskurate raho aap hamesha aise hiOr ham bane rahe dil mein apke.

shayari: Sabse Pyara Lagta Hain Humein Ye Khas Din,Jise Bitana Nahi Chaahtein Hum Aapke Bin,Waise Toh Dil Deta Hain Sada Dua Aapko,Phir B Kehtein Hain Mubaarak Ho Aapko Ye Janamdin.

shayari: Aaj ka khaas din mubarak ho aap ko,Pyare pyare khwaab Mubarak ho aap ko,Jindgi ke sath jo aayi hai khushiyo khub sariWo khusiyan ki bhar Mubarak ho aap ko.

shayari: Sitaron Se Aage Bhi Koi Jahan Hoga,Jahan Ke Saare Nazaron Ki Kasam,Aapse Pyaara Wahan Bhi Na Hoga.

shayari: bahut pahle se un qadmon ki aahaT jaan lete haintujhe ai zindagi hum dur se pahchan lete hain…

title: Zindagi sham se pehle he thak
shayari: Zindagi sham se pehle he thak jaaye,Toh Khwaab aankho mai hai woh kidhar jaaye.

title: Roya hai bahut tab jaakar kara
shayari: Roya hai bahut tab jaakar karaar mila hai,Iss jahan me kise bhala uska sacha pyar mila hai,Guzar rahi hai zindagi imethaan ke daur se,Ek khatam to dusra taiyaar mila hai.

title: Zindagi haseen hai zindagi se
shayari: Zindagi haseen hai zindagi se pyar karo,Ho raat to subah ka intzar karo,Wo pal bhi aayega jis pal ka intzar hai apko,Bas rab pe bharosa aur waqt pe aitbar karo.

title: Kyu Mere Liye Koi Intzar Kareg
shayari: Kyu Mere Liye Koi Intzar Karega,Apni Zindgi Mere Liye Bekrar Karega.Me Kya Hu Meri Hasti Hi Kya Hai,Kya Dekhkar Humse Koi Pyar Karega

title: Aye Zindagi Ek Baar Tu Nazdeek
shayari: Aye Zindagi Ek Baar Tu Nazdeek Aa Tanha Hoon Main,Yaa Door Say Phir Day Koi Sada Tanha Hoon Main,Duniya Ki Mehfil Main Kaheen Main Hoon Bhi Shayad Ya Nahee,Ek Umar Say Iss Soch Main Dooba Hua Tanha Hoon Main.

title: Zindagi Ke Mod Par Ek Eysa Waq
shayari: Zindagi Ke Mod Par Ek Eysa Waqt Aata Hai,Jab Insaan Apane Aapko Tanha Pata Hai,Wahi Tanhai to Batati Hai,Ki Kon Kiska Kitna Sath Nibhata Hai.

title: Mana Zindagi Ek Kawab Hai,Par
shayari: Mana Zindagi Ek Kawab Hai,Par Har Kawab Ko Manzil Nahi Milti,Mushkilon mein bhag jana asaan hota hai,Har pehlu zindagi ka imtihan hota hai,Darne walon ko kuchh milta nahi zindagi mein,Aur ladne walon ke kadmon mein jahan hota hai.

title: Zindagi Pal – Pal Dhalti Hai,
shayari: Zindagi Pal – Pal Dhalti Hai, Jaise Ret Mutthi Se Phisalti Hai!!Shikwe Kitne Bhi Ho Har Pal, Phir Bhi Haste Rahna..!!Kyun Ki Ye Zindagi Jaise Bhi Hai, Bas Ek He Bar Milti Hai.

title: zindgi ki haqeeqat sirf itni h
shayari: zindgi ki haqeeqat sirf itni hoti h,jab jagta h insan to kismat soti h,insan jis per apna haq khud se jyada samjhta h,wo amant aksar kisi aur ki hoti h.

title: Zindagi ka har zakham uski meh
shayari: Zindagi ka har zakham uski meharbani hai.Meri zindagi to ek adhuri kahani hai.Chahte to mita dete har dard ko.Magar ye dard hi to uski Aakhri nishani hai.

title: Zindagi Kanto Ka Safar Hai…Hau
shayari: Zindagi Kanto Ka Safar Hai…Hausla Is Ki Pahchan HaiRaste Par To Sabhi Chalte Hain…Jo Raste Banaye Wai To Insaan Hai.

title: Ab Toh Kuchh Apni Tabiyat Bhi
shayari: Ab Toh Kuchh Apni Tabiyat Bhi Juda Lagti Hai,Saans Leta Hun Toh Zakhmo Ko Hawa Lagti Hai,Kabhi Razi Toh Kabhi Mujse Khafa Lagti Hai,Zindgi Tu Hi Bata Tu Meri Kya Lagti Hai.

title: Mujh Se Naaraj Hai to Chhod De
shayari: Mujh Se Naaraj Hai to Chhod De Tanha Mujhko,Aye Zindagi, Mujhe Roz Roz Tamasha Na Banaya Kar.

title: Parhne Walon Ki Kami Ho Gayi H
shayari: Parhne Walon Ki Kami Ho Gayi Hai Aaj Is Zamaane Mein…Varna Meri Zindagi Ka Har Panna, Puri Kitaab Hai.

title: Wohi Ranjishen Wohi Hasratein,
shayari: Wohi Ranjishen Wohi Hasratein,Na Hi Dard-E-Dil Me Kami Huyi,Hai Azeeb Si Meri Zindagi,Na Gujar Saki Na Khatm Huyi.

title: Na jane kiyo ate hai mere zind
shayari: Na jane kiyo ate hai mere zindagi me wo logwafaye ker nai sakty, wade hazar kerte hai.

title: Tum sath ho to Muqaddar pe Huk
shayari: Tum sath ho to Muqaddar pe Hukumat ApniBin Tere zindagi ki Auqaat hi kya hai.

title: Bahut kuch sikha jati h zindag
shayari: Bahut kuch sikha jati h zindagi,Hasa ke rula jati hain zindagi,Jee sako jitna utna jee lo dosto,Kyuki bahut kuch baki rah jata h Aur khatm ho jati hain zindagi.

title: Bade Ajeeb hai Yeh Zindgi ke R
shayari: Bade Ajeeb hai Yeh Zindgi ke Raste..Anjane Mod par Kuch Log Dost Ban Jate haiMilne ki Khushi de ya na de.Bichadne ka Gam Jarur de Jate hai.

title: Samajh Na Aaya Aye Zindagi Ter
shayari: Samajh Na Aaya Aye Zindagi Tera Ye Falsafa,Ek Taraf Kahtey Hain Sabr Ka Fal Meetha HaiAur Doosri Taraf Kehte Hain Waqt Kisi Ka Intezaar Nahi Karta.

title: Saanson Ke Silsile Ko Na Do Zi
shayari: Saanson Ke Silsile Ko Na Do Zindagi Ka Naam,Jeene Ke Ba-Wajood Bhi Mar Jaate Hain Kuch Log.

title: Karni Hai Khuda Se Duaa Ki Ter
shayari: Karni Hai Khuda Se Duaa Ki Teri Mohabbat Ke Siva Kuch Na Mile,Zindagi Me Tu Mile Sirf Tu, Ya Phir Zindagi Na Mile.

title: Maine apni khwaishon ko deewar
shayari: Maine apni khwaishon ko deewar mai chunwa diya,Khama-khan zindagi main anarkali banke nach rahi thi.

title: Maine Bhi Badal Diye Hain Zind
shayari: Maine Bhi Badal Diye Hain Zindagi Ke UsOOl,Ab Jo Yaad Karega, sirf Wahi Yaad Rahega.

title: Itni thokar dene ke liye shukr
shayari: Itni thokar dene ke liye shukriya aey zindagi,Chalne ka nahi sahi sambhalne ka hunar toh aa gaya.
